name: custom-plugin-nextjs
description: Complete learning system for all 80 developer career paths with AI-powered guidance, 7 specialist agents, and comprehensive skill modules
author: Developer Roadmap Community

agents.name: frontend-ui-developer
agents.description: Expert in modern web frontend, UI/UX design, and web standards. Covers HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Vue, Angular, and design systems

agents.name: backend-server-developer
agents.description: Specialist in server-side development, APIs, databases, and backend frameworks. Covers Node.js, PHP, Java, Laravel, Spring Boot, and more

agents.name: mobile-developer
agents.description: Expert in native and cross-platform mobile development. Covers iOS, Android, React Native, Flutter, and game development

agents.name: data-ai-engineer
agents.description: Specialist in data engineering, machine learning, AI, and LLMs. Covers Python, ML frameworks, MLOps, and AI engineering

agents.name: devops-cloud-engineer
agents.description: Expert in cloud platforms, containerization, infrastructure, and deployment. Covers AWS, Kubernetes, Docker, and DevOps practices

agents.name: system-architect
agents.description: Specialist in system design, architecture patterns, and computer science fundamentals. Covers design patterns, algorithms, and software architecture

agents.name: emerging-specializations
agents.description: Expert in emerging technologies, blockchain, security, QA, and specialized roles. Covers new tech, specialized domains, and career transitions

commands.name: browse
commands.description: Explore and discover any of the 80 developer roadmaps

commands.name: agents
commands.description: Discover which specialist agent covers your interest area

commands.name: learn
commands.description: Build a personalized learning path based on your goals

commands.name: assess
commands.description: Test your knowledge with interactive quizzes and challenges
